nodes.text: Kala Kevv, code-named Prodigal-One, was a Sullustan male pilot during the Galactic Civil War. While flying for the Alliance to Restore the Republic, Kevv's Y-wing starfighter crashed on NCW-781. The resulting rescue operation retrieved both him and his datacard.
Kala Kevv appears in the 1996 roleplaying game sourcebook Instant Adventures.
As an option, the X-wing pilot in "Into the Heat of Battle" my be made into Kevv.
